articles.title: North Side Sends Notices to South Side
articles.content:
North Side Sends Notices to South Side
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee, the chairman of the Central Committee of the DPRK Red Cross Society and the chief of the north side to the Consultative Office for North-South Economic Cooperation separately sent notices to the Ministry of Unification of the south side, the president of the south Korean Red Cross and the chief of the south side to the Consultative Office for North-South Economic Cooperation on Monday. They formally informed them of the practical measures as clarified in the important proposal set forth in the recent joint statement of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations and the statement issued by a spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea as regards the measures for putting it into practice. 
					 They proposed having a working contact for talks between the authorities of the north and the south in Kaesong on January 27 and talks between the Red Cross organizations of the north and the south in Munsan, the area of the south side, on February 1. They informed them that the Panmunjom Red Cross liaison channel would be reopened from January 12 and the above-said office would be regularly operated.

articles.title: New Year's Greening Campaign Launched
articles.content:
New Year's Greening Campaign Launched
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- A greening campaign for this year has started in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Kim Hyon, a department director of the Ministry of Urban Management, told KCNA that a new scheme for afforestation has already reached a working stage throughout the country.
					
					 According to the scheme, the campaign for planting trees and flowers will take place in a scientific and artistic way. 
					
					 In every provincial seat, a street will be taken as a model in the campaign and its achievements and experience will be introduced in other streets and villages.
					
					 In Pyongyang, Ponghwa Street was chosen as a model. Various species of trees and flowers are now being planted in the street.
					
					 Tree and flower nurseries and greenhouses will increase their production capacity and more than 100 new species of flowers will be cultivated for a successful campaign.
					
					 The joint New Year editorial issued by leading newspapers of the country says that the landscaping and forestation should be done on a long-term basis and in a scientific way, and that everyone should turn his or her native place and workplace into a socialist fairyland.

articles.title: Best Footballers for 2010
articles.content:
Best Footballers for 2010 
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Best footballers for Juche 99 (2010) were selected in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 They are Ri Kwang Chon, a 25-year-old boy, and Jo Yun Mi, a 24-year-old girl. Both of them are belonging to the April 25 Sports Team.
					
					 They distinguished themselves in international tournaments held last year.
					
					 Jo was named best player at the AFC Women's Asian Cup 2010.
					
					 The boy and girl are now active in national football teams.

articles.title: Korean People Encouraged by Spirit of WPK Conference
articles.content:
Korean People Encouraged by Spirit of WPK Conference
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Juche 100 (2011) is the first year the Korean people have greeted after the historic conference of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Kim Jong Il was reelected WPK general secretary at the conference held in last September.
					
					 It was a political event to provide a definite guarantee for the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The conference demonstrated the Korean people's will to always remain faithful to the leadership of Kim Jong Il, united around him.
					
					 It also showed their determination to build a thriving nation in an indomitable way and accomplish the revolutionary cause under the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 Encouraged by the spirit of the WPK conference, the Korean people have launched the new year's onward movement.

articles.title: S. Korea Urged to Come out for North-South Dialogue
articles.content:
S. Korea Urged to Come out for North-South Dialogue
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration Friday released a statement under the title "The government should immediately come out for south-north dialogue from a positive stand."
					 The statement said that the south-north relations based on reconciliation and cooperation are the only way for achieving peace and prosperity on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 At the outset of the New Year, the north proposed wide-ranging dialogue and negotiations between the south and the north, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 The "government" should take this as an opportunity of achieving national reconciliation and peace and not refuse to come out for dialogue, putting conditionality on the proposal of the north.
					
					  Underscoring the need for the south and the north to pave a wide avenue of peace and prosperity through positive negotiations, the statement called for restoring multi-faceted dialogue and exchange not only between the authorities but between political parties and civic and public organizations.
					
					 The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea at a press conference in Seoul on Jan. 5 urged the U.S. and south Korean authorities to come out for dialogue and negotiations for achieving peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korea to Stage Field Tactical Military Exercises
articles.content:
S. Korea to Stage Field Tactical Military Exercises
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The 53rd infantry division of the south Korean puppet army announced that it would stage field tactical exercises aimed at invading the DPRK from Jan. 10, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The bellicose forces declared that the three regiments of the division would have live firing exercises in the areas of Pusan, Ulsan and Ryangsan, moving with war equipment at intervals of one week.
					
					 They claim that the exercises are for coping with someone's "infiltration and local provocation".
					
					  Such frantic war moves against the DPRK are arousing strong denunciation and protest from among the people at home and abroad as they drive the situation of the Korean Peninsula to the worst phase.

articles.title: Suppression of Pro-reunification Activist Assailed
articles.content:
Suppression of Pro-reunification Activist Assailed
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification released a statement on Jan. 6 denouncing the security authorities' unreasonable suppression of its honorary chairman Ri Jong Rin.
					 The statement accused the Yongdungpho Police Station in Seoul of issuing a summons to the honorary chairman to appear at the police station on charge of the violation of the "law on assembly and demonstration" for the mere reason that a press conference was held by the headquarters before the building of the Intelligence Service in May 2009.
					
					 The statement held that the holding of the press conference was a just action taken in protest against the police's reckless suppression of the headquarters. 
					
					 This being a hard reality, the security authorities are suppressing him under an absurd pretext though he conducted activities for independence, democracy and reunification, the statement deplored, expressing an irrepressible anger at them. 
					
					 Chiding the security authorities' suppression from the outset of the year, the statement declared that people from all walks of life would struggle against the unreasonable suppression of the forces for reunification and democracy.

articles.title: DPRK Joint Statement Supported by Chongryon
articles.content:
DPRK Joint Statement Supported by Chongryon
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), issued a statement Friday in support of the joint statement of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations.
					 The statement said that the joint New Year editorial is powerfully encouraging not only all Koreans at home but also Chongryon and compatriots in Japan in their nationwide struggle for glorifying another decade of the 21st century as a decade of putting an end to the tragedy of national split and achieving reunification and prosperity. 
					
					 Chongryon and the Koreans in Japan unequivocally support and hail the joint statement which contained a proposal for having wide-ranging dialogue and negotiations with the political parties and organizations including the authorities of south Korea, the statement noted.
					
					 It demanded the south Korean authorities give up at once sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with fellow countrymen aimed at bringing misfortune, sufferings and war disasters to all the fellow countrymen, and urged all the political parties and organizations of south Korea to positively respond to the important proposal from the stand of protecting the interests of the nation.
					
					 It called upon Chongryon and Koreans from all walks of life in Japan including those affiliated to the south Korean Residents Association in Japan to support the joint statement and turn out as one in the struggle to open an epochal phase of peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: DPRK Joint New Year Editorial Supported
articles.content:
DPRK Joint New Year Editorial Supported
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Norway, the Czech Republic, Switzerland and Germany made public statements in support of the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK.
					 The Friendship Society Norway-Korea in its statement recalled this year's tasks laid down in the joint editorial. And it expressed firm belief that under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Jong Il, the Korean people would bring about a decisive turn in the improvement of the people's standard of living by accelerating the development of light industry once again this year and thus build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation in the near future without fail.
					
					 The Czech, Moravian, Silesian Trade Unions' Association of the Czech Republic in its statement said that the tasks for national reunification set forth in the joint editorial are the most reasonable way for Korea's reunification. It expressed support for the Korean people in the efforts to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country through implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement expressed belief that the grand goals laid down in the joint editorial would be hit without fail.
					
					 Fully supporting the joint editorial, the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany in a statement said: The editorial called for removing the confrontation between the north and the south as soon as possible, defending peace from the danger of war and positively promoting dialogue and cooperation between the two sides at the time when the U.S. and the south Korean authorities were extremely aggravating the situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Statements supporting the joint editorial were issued by Harising Khang, member of the C.C., Communist Party of India (Marxist), and Eric Andersson, international secretary of the Communist Party in Sweden.

articles.title: Avisan a la parte Sur medidas de accion
articles.content:
Avisan a la parte Sur medidas de accion
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ATCC) -- De acuerdo con la propuesta importante presentada en la reciente declaracion conjunta del gobierno, los partidos politicos y las entidades de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y con la declaracion del portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria publicada con el proposito de ponerla en practica, el Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y Pacifico, el presidente del CC de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la RPDC y el presidente de la parte Norte de la Oficina de Consulta de Cooperacion Economica Norte-Sur enviaron avisos el dia 10 por separados al Ministerio de Reunificacion, el presidentes de la Sociedad de la Cruz Roja del Sur de Corea y al presidente de la parte Sur de la Oficina de Consulta de Cooperacion Economica Norte-Sur para notificarles oficialmente unas medidas de accion.
					  A traves de los avisos, los remitentes propusieron sostener el 27 de enero en Kaesong el contacto de trabajo con vistas a las conversaciones entre las autoridades del Norte y el Sur y realizar el primero de febrero las conversaciones de cruz roja N-S en Munsan del Sur de Corea.
					
					  Igualmente, informaron la reapertura del canal de enlace de la cruz roja en Phanmunjom y la operacion normal de la Oficina de Consulta de Cooperacion Economica Norte-Sur a partir del dia 12.

articles.title: Tiene lugar carrera colectiva por el Dia de Deportes
articles.content:
Tiene lugar carrera colectiva por el Dia de Deportes
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ATCC) -- En ocasion del primer dia de deportes de este ano, tuvo lugar el dia 9 la carrera colectiva de los funcionarios de los ministerios y organos centrales de Corea.
					Ellos se reunieron primero en la Plaza Kim Il Sung con la determinacion de practicar el deporte de modo masivo y cotidiano para emprender con salud la marcha en gran auge por construir una gran potencia prospera.
					
					Luego, corrieron divididos en dos grupos a lo largo de la avenida Sungri y la Mansudae.
					
					Los funcionarios de los Ministerios de Industria Ligera, de Industria Carbonifera, de Industria Electrica, de Industria Metalurgica y de Agricultura, la Direccion Unha, la Direccion de Industria de Maquinas Extractivas, etc., avanzaron a pasos firmes manifestando su disposicion de cumplir con toda su responsabilidad en la ofensiva general de este ano y contribuir asi a la realizacion de la estrategia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea sobre el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo.
					
					El entusiasmo de los corredores acentuo mas el ambiente de la capital agitada por la gran marcha hacia el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo. 
					
					El viceministro de Industria Carbonifera, Kim Mun Chang, (de 53 anos de edad) dijo a la ATCC que hay que ser saludable para trabajar bien y agrego que los funcionarios publicos, que trabajan generalmente en la oficina, deben practicar mucho los deportes masivos si quieren mejorar su constitucion fisica y alcanzar mayores exitos en el trabajo.
					
					El mismo dia, los funcionarios, trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares de todas las provincias, ciudades y distritos celebraron con la misma actividad el dia de deportes.

articles.title: Seleccionados mejores futbolistas de 2010
articles.content:
Seleccionados mejores futbolistas de 2010
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ATCC) -- Ri Kwang Chon (muchacho de 25 anos de edad) y Jo Yun Mi (muchacha de 24 anos) han sido seleccionados como mejores jugadores de futbol de Corea para el 99 (2010) de la Era Juche.
					  Ambos son del Conjunto Deportivo 25 de Abril y forman parte de las selecciones nacionales de respectivos sexos.
					
					  Ellos brillaron en los partidos internacionales del ano pasado mostrando sus grandes habilidades en manejar el balon y golear.
					
					  En particular, Jo Yun Mi ha sido elegida como mejor jugadora de la Copa Asiatica 2010 (F).

articles.title: Espiritu de la Conferencia del PTC es remedio omnipotente
articles.content:
Espiritu de la Conferencia del PTC es remedio omnipotente
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ATCC) -- El 100 (2011) de la Era Juche es el primer ano que el pueblo coreano acoge despues de la historica Conferencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, efectuada en septiembre del ano pasado.
					  El foro reeligio al Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del PTC.
					
					  Esto deviene un evento politico que preparo la garantia firme para el triunfo definitivo de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					  El espiritu de la Conferencia del PTC es el de la unidad monolitica de defender invariablemente el centro de la cohesion y de la direccion por mucho que pase el tiempo.
					
					  Tambien es el espiritu indoblegable de la marcha forzada de construir una potencia prospera superando todas las pruebas y las dificultades interpuestas y el de la revolucion continua de llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria apoyando el gran partido.
					
					  El pueblo coreano acelera con vigor la marcha general de ano nuevo tomando por remedio omnipotente el espiritu de la Conferencia del PTC que refleja nueva etapa historica de la revolucion.
